Banner.Description: We have many years of experience developing systems, cloud automation, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. We are dedicated to automation, refactoring, CI/CD, and secure, clean code in Angular and TypeScript, and being good Cloud citizens.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In over 20 years of experience, I have covered various roles including Senior Staff Software Engineer, DevOps Engineer, and Technical Lead.
I have a strong passion for technology and a deep understanding of the software development lifecycle, particularly in the realm of DevOps.
I excel at integrating security best practices into DevOps workflows, ensuring seamless and secure deployment processes.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Staff Software Engineer
Description: Leader of 25 engineers in crucial migration and TSA exit
AWS automation and migration of 100+ applications
Python, CloudFormation, Terraform, Ansible, Docker, and more
Technical lead and sole developer in the development of certificate automation
Implementation of Agile in the infrastructure team

Experience.Jobs.Title: DevOps Lead Engineer
Description: Introduced CI/CD to the Enterprise - leading to a 4,200% decrease in deployment time
Implemented dozens of Angular, TypeScript, and JavaScript applications
Mentored development teams in best practices, CI/CD, Jenkins, and Azure DevOps

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description: Developed global enhancements to PLM platform with C++ and Java

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: Reach out and let me know how I can help you!
